Class FilterView

java.lang.Object
views.FilterView
public class FilterView extends Object
View class responsible for handling the display and interaction related to filtering projects.

      public FilterView()

  • Method Details

    • displayActiveFilters

      public static void displayActiveFilters(Map<String,String> activeFilters)
      Displays the currently active filters.
      Parameters:
      activeFilters - A map containing the active filter criteria (e.g., "location", "flatType").

    • displayFilterMenu

      public static int displayFilterMenu(Map<String,String> activeFilters)
      Displays the filter menu options.
      Parameters:
      activeFilters - A map indicating if filters are currently active.
      Returns:
      The user's menu choice.

    • promptLocationFilter

      public static String promptLocationFilter(List<Project> projects)
      Prompts the user to enter a location filter by selecting from available locations.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of projects to extract locations from.
      Returns:
      The location string selected by the user, or null to remove the filter.

    • promptFlatTypeFilter

      public static String promptFlatTypeFilter()
      Prompts the user to select a flat type filter.
      Returns:
      The selected FlatType enum name, or null if the user wants to remove the filter.
